entry.title: Arctic Blast Set to Bring Record-Breaking Cold Across United States
entry.summary: An intense Arctic air mass is poised to deliver some of the coldest temperatures the United States has experienced in the past year. This upcoming cold snap, expected to begin this weekend, is anticipated to be more severe and widespread than the January 2023 freeze that impacted NFL games and

entry.title: ROSEBURG TEACHER RECEIVING PRESIDENTIAL AWARD FOR EXCELLENCE
entry.summary: January 16, 2025 3:40 a.m. A Roseburg teacher is receiving a national honor. PAEMST are the nation’s highest honors for teachers of science, technology, engineering and mathematics. Lazur has 15 years of education experience...
